statements: SELECT * FROM DiseaseStudy;
SELECT patient_id, disease_type, study_date FROM DiseaseStudy WHERE disease_type = 'Cancer' ORDER BY study_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_response FROM DiseaseStudy WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT disease_type) AS unique_diseases FROM DiseaseStudy;
SELECT AVG(treatment_id) AS avg_treatment_id FROM DiseaseStudy;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseStudy WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY study_date DESC, treatment_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, disease_type, treatment_id FROM DiseaseStudy WHERE treatment_response = 'positive';
SELECT DISTINCT disease_type FROM DiseaseStudy;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, study_date FROM DiseaseStudy WHERE study_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id, treatment_response FROM DiseaseStudy WHERE disease_type LIKE 'cancer' AND treatment_response IN ('complete', 'partial') ORDER BY treatment_response DESC;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseProgressionData;
SELECT age, gender FROM DiseaseProgressionData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT disease_type, progression_stage FROM DiseaseProgressionData WHERE age > 50;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentResponseData ORDER BY treatment_duration ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM DiseaseProgressionData;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, disease_type, progression_stage FROM DiseaseProgressionData;
SELECT patient_id, gender, age, progression_stage, disease_type FROM DiseaseProgressionData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_duration, treatment_outcome, patient_id FROM TreatmentResponseData WHERE treatment_outcome='Successful';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type, treatment_duration FROM TreatmentResponseData ORDER BY treatment_duration ASC;
SELECT patient_id, disease_type, progression_stage FROM DiseaseProgressionData JOIN TreatmentResponseData ON DiseaseProgressionData.patient_id = TreatmentResponseData.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM disease_progression;
SELECT patient_id, disease_type, diagnosis_date FROM disease_progression WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_started_date, treatment_response FROM disease_progression WHERE treatment_response = 'Positive';
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, ethnicity FROM patient_data ORDER BY age DESC, ethnicity ASC;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_type, medication_name, treatment_date FROM treatment_details WHERE dosage >= 100;
SELECT * FROM disease_progression ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC, patient_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, disease_type, treatment_started_date FROM disease_progression WHERE patient_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS diagnosis_count FROM disease_progression GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM patient_data WHERE age > 40 AND smoker = TRUE;
SELECT treatment_type, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM treatment_details GROUP BY treatment_type ORDER BY AVG(dosage) DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Demographics WHERE age > 60;
SELECT patient_id, ethnicity FROM Patient_Demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT disease_type, diagnosis_details FROM Disease_Diagnosis ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Treatment_Records WHERE treatment_type = 'Medication' AND dosage >= 100;
SELECT patient_id, response_type FROM Treatment_Outcomes WHERE response_type = 'Positive' ORDER BY outcome_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Demographics;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM Patient_Demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT diagnosis_id, patient_id, disease_type FROM Disease_Diagnosis WHERE patient_id = 1;

SELECT TD.patient_id, TD.age, TR.treatment_type, TO.response_type FROM Patient_Demographics TD JOIN Treatment_Records TR ON TD.patient_id = TR.patient_id JOIN Treatment_Outcomes TO ON TR.record_id = TO.record_id;
SELECT * FROM Disease_Diagnosis WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM DiseaseProgression;
SELECT patient_id, disease_name, progression_status FROM DiseaseProgression ORDER BY severity_level DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientDetails WHERE age > 40;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentResponse WHERE response_status = 'successful';
SELECT physician_id, physician_name, specialization FROM PhysicianDetails ORDER BY physician_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseProgression WHERE severity_level > 3 ORDER BY disease_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, disease_name, progression_status FROM DiseaseProgression WHERE disease_name = 'COVID-19' AND progression_status = 'Stable'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM PatientDetails WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50
SELECT physician_name, specialization FROM PhysicianDetails ORDER BY specialization DESC
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
